1.title: Contact

episode of.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars (TV Mini-Series 2011–2013)

1.plot: The Story so far: A Spartan Team Patrols the area for any suspicious activity, and they get ambushed by The Covenant. The Battle Begins.

2.title: Ambush

episode of.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars (TV Mini-Series 2011–2013)

2.plot: The Story so far: Spartan team Forte is evacuating the area until they are attacked by more Covenant forces.

3.title: Arrival

episode of.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars (TV Mini-Series 2011–2013)

3.plot: Spartan Team Forte finally make it to the local UNSC base and begin to prepare to advance towards the city of Karadiay. There is one problem in the way though.

4.title: Rebirth

episode of.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars (TV Mini-Series 2011–2013)

4.plot: While the Covenant hunts down the last remaining Humans in the crumbling city, the UNSC plans to launch a counter-attack and supplies but lost contact with Team 12. The UNSC Command sent out 7-Charlie 30 to hunt for the survivors.

5.title: Aftermath

episode of.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars (TV Mini-Series 2011–2013)

5.plot: The Covenant's victory in the city had caused the Human's to lose their last defense. Which lead the Covenant to burn the entire planet. Leaving the planet to ash. But the planet wasn't burning from the Covenant, it came from the inside.

6.title: Patrol

episode of.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars (TV Mini-Series 2011–2013)

6.plot: Hours before the events of Episode Seven, the Covenant's ground forces have seemed to be creating bases all across the planet. Intrigued by this information, the Colonel sent out squads of ODST's to seek out the location's of these bases. A scout team of two ODST's journey out to the area of New Charleston, only to discover that they are not the only enemy.

imdb.plot outline: The year is 2537 and the UNSC fight for peace against the mighty and powerful Covenant. As the battle rages on, many will die and the planet they fought to protect will be burned. But, there are a few heroes that will stand to fight, the legendary Spartans.
imdb.title: Halo Mega Bloks Stopmotion: Halo Wars
